mav_sim.chap6.pid_control module¶

pid_control

  • Beard & McLain, PUP, 2012

  • Last Update:

    2/6/2019 - RWB 12/21 - GND

class mav_sim.chap6.pid_control.PIDControl(kp: float = 0.0, ki: float = 0.0, kd: float = 0.0, Ts: float = 0.01, sigma: float = 0.05, limit: float = 1.0)¶

Bases: object

Proportional integral derivative control

update(y_ref: float, y: float, reset_flag: bool = False) → float¶

Calculate the PID control

Trapazoidal rule used for integrator and a low-pass filter for derivative

Parameters:

  • y_ref – desired value

  • y – actual value

  • reset_flag – True => the integrator and derivative calculation will be zeroed out

Output:

u_sat: thresholded control output

update_with_rate(y_ref: float, y: float, ydot: float, reset_flag: bool = False) → float¶

Calculate the PID control given the derivative value

Integral calculated using trapazoidal rule

Parameters:

  • y_ref – desired value

  • y – actual value

  • ydot – time derivative

  • reset_flag – True => the integrator and derivative calculation will be zeroed out

Output:

u_sat: thresholded control output
